Title: Enacts the "Elderly Crime Prevention and Control Trust Fund Act"
Summary: Establishes an elderly crime prevention and control trust fund to be funded by an initial appropriation and administrative assessment penalties on persons convicted of felonies when an elderly person is a victim; provides that the fund is to be administered by the division of criminal justice services which shall give grants to organizations who will set up programs to prevent crimes against elderly persons.
LawCode: Add Art 4 §§401 - 408, Eld L; add §80.20, Pen L; add §420.37, CP L; add §97-uuuu, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, the penal law, the criminal procedure law and the state finance law, in relation to crime prevention and control; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
